description.en_US: Fire an arc of star projectiles.
Fire a controllable, sustained volley of piercing stars.
Slam the ground to create an expanding shockwave to hit nearby enemies.
Summon a spinning blade in front of you that both damages enemies and heals allies.
Channel an earthquake that repeatedly hits all grounded enemies in a large area and causes falling rocks.
Attack with a cursed blade. Hits enemies to send them flying but also hit allies to \c[1]sacrifice\c[0] them and absorb \c[2]+20%\c[0] HP.
Dash through your enemies and summon a trail of short-lived Hillkats.
Dash and attack a single enemy, marking them to be pelted by falling stars.
Dash through enemies and leave an army of Hillkats that throw rocks.
Dash and stun a single enemy before calling down a massive star to fall on them.
Perfect guard a melee attack to strike an enemy and inflict them with \c[1]-40% ATK\c[0] for a short time. Stackable.
Enter a trance to \c[2]heal\c[0] yourself and nearby allies over time, lasting until interrupted or canceled. User has \c[1]-20% DEF\c[0] while active.
Perfect guard a melee attack to instantly shatter the attacker and disable them for a while. Target takes damage when they recover.
Provide a \c[1]+20% ATK\c[0] buff for yourself and nearby allies. Slows your own movement speed by \c[1]-25%\c[0] while active.
Temporary slow motion for animation dev use.
